title: Railways facilitates citizens with stop-overs
content:
LAHORE, Feb 27 (APP):In a move to accommodate people during the Urs at Astana-e-Aalia Chora Sharif, the Pakistan Railways administration has granted permission for three trains to halt at Chora Sharif Railway Station for two minutes each.
According to the PR spokesperson on Tuesday, Mehr Express (127Up, 128Dn),
Thal Express (129Up, 130Dn) and Kohat Express (133Up, 134Dn) will make brief stop-overs
from February 28 to March 2, 2024, providing convenience to travelers attending the event.
